title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. [Missing Steps to Reproduce]
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name from different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up stating 'Problems were encountered during export'. The detail of the error message lists the file of the same name in Project 2 as the problem.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip')
4. Begin export to zip file
